name: Mahou no Shoujo: Between the Worlds
name_original: Mahou no Shoujo: Between the Worlds
description:
Mahou no Shoujo Between the Worlds is a experimental Horror Game for the J-Horror Jam. 

Rias is a 16-year-old high school girl with no special talents. For some weeks now, however, the girl has been plagued by terrible headaches.

At the end of the last day of school, the headaches become worse. Suddenly and without warning, Rias finds himself in a strange place and receives an urgent message from a mysterous Manifestion.

Desperately Rias tries to distinguish between reality and fiction, but step by step she falls into madness.

Together with her best friends Momo and Lea Rias sets out to decipher the message of the being...

The game is a mix of horror, adventure and classic RPG.

The Demo includes the Chapter .tempus.

English is not my Native Language, sorry for some spelling issues. I will fix it later.
